articles.title: Jio Financial Services to acquire Paytm wallet business? Mukesh Ambani's company issues statement - ET Now
articles.description: According to an exchange filing by Jio Financial Services on Monday, the Mukesh Ambani-owned company is not in talks with Vijay Shekhar Sharma-led One 97 Communications to acquire Paytm wallet business.
